long_description: Small enough to toss in your luggage, the REI Compact Digital Scale helps you avoid costly overweight baggage fees when you travel. Scale is easy to use: Just lift an item and wait for the beep; then set it down and read the large digital display; it can weigh items up to 100 lbs. (44 kg). Durable webbing strap with hook holds item being weighed. Automatic hold feature keeps the weight in the display once weight is set. Includes two 2032 cell batteries.
short_description: Small enough to toss in your luggage, the REI Compact Digital Scale helps you avoid costly overweight baggage fees when you travel.
